SEARCH
Package executor.service.mapper

Interface ScenarioMapper

public interface ScenarioMapper
Mapper interface for converting ScenarioResult entities to corresponding ScenarioResultResponse DTOs.

The ScenarioMapper interface is annotated with Mapper from MapStruct, indicating that it is a mapper component with specific configuration options. It defines methods for converting individual ScenarioResult instances and lists of ScenarioResult instances to ScenarioResultResponse instances.

The configuration options include: - componentModel = "spring": Specifies that the generated mapper should be a Spring bean and can be injected using Spring's dependency injection. - unmappedTargetPolicy = ReportingPolicy.IGNORE: Ignores unmapped target properties during the mapping process. - nullValuePropertyMappingStrategy = NullValuePropertyMappingStrategy.IGNORE: Ignores null values during property mapping. - uses = {StepMapper.class}: Specifies the usage of another mapper, in this case, the StepMapper, for mapping properties of nested objects.

Methods in this mapper interface convert instances of ScenarioResult to ScenarioResultResponse. It is important to ensure that the StepMapper is properly configured and available for nested mapping.

See Also:

  • ScenarioResultResponse
  • StepMapper

  • Method Details

    • scenarioResultToScenarioResponse

      ScenarioResultResponse scenarioResultToScenarioResponse(ScenarioResult result)
      Converts a ScenarioResult entity to a ScenarioResultResponse DTO.

      This method is responsible for converting an instance of ScenarioResult to the corresponding ScenarioResultResponse DTO. It is part of the ScenarioMapper interface annotated with Mapper. The conversion process may involve mapping properties and nested objects, and it is influenced by the configured options such as unmappedTargetPolicy, nullValuePropertyMappingStrategy, and uses.

      It is important to ensure that the StepMapper is properly configured and available for nested mapping if the ScenarioResult contains properties of type

      invalid reference 
      Step
      or other nested objects.

      Parameters:
      result - The ScenarioResult entity to be converted.
      Returns:
      A ScenarioResultResponse DTO representing the converted result.
      See Also:
      • Mapper
      • ScenarioResult
      • ScenarioResultResponse
      • StepMapper

    • scenarioResultToScenarioResponse

      List<ScenarioResultResponse> scenarioResultToScenarioResponse(List<ScenarioResult> results)
      Converts a list of ScenarioResult entities to a list of ScenarioResultResponse DTOs.

      This method is responsible for converting a list of ScenarioResult entities to the corresponding list of ScenarioResultResponse DTOs. It is part of the ScenarioMapper interface annotated with Mapper. The conversion process may involve mapping properties and nested objects, and it is influenced by the configured options such as unmappedTargetPolicy, nullValuePropertyMappingStrategy, and uses.

      It is important to ensure that the StepMapper is properly configured and available for nested mapping if the ScenarioResult entities contain properties of type

      invalid reference 
      Step
      or other nested objects.

      Parameters:
      results - The list of ScenarioResult entities to be converted.
      Returns:
      A list of ScenarioResultResponse DTOs representing the converted results.
